member.name: T:FastDeepCloner.CloneLevel
member.summary: CloneLevel FirstLevelOnly = Only InternalTypes Hierarki = All types Hierarki

member.name: T:FastDeepCloner.ConfigrationManager
member.summary: globa ConfigrationManager, for managing the library settings

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.CreateInstance``1(System.Object[])
member.summary: Create CreateInstance() this will use ILGenerator to create new object from the cached ILGenerator This is alot faster then using Activator or GetUninitializedObject. TThe library will be using ILGenerator or Expression depending on the platform and then cach both the contructorinfo and the type, so it can be reused later on

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.CreateInstance(System.Type,System.Object[])
member.summary: Create CreateInstance() this will use ILGenerator to create new object from the cached ILGenerator This is alot faster then using Activator or GetUninitializedObject. The library will be using ILGenerator or Expression depending on the platform and then cach both the contructorinfo and the type, so it can be reused later on

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.GetListItemType(System.Type)
member.summary: Get the internal item type of the List or ObservableCollection types
member.returns: will return the same value if the type is not an list type

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.ActAsInterface(System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Convert an object to an interface The object dose not have to inherit from the interface as the library will handle the job of doing it

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.ActAsInterface``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Convert an object to an interface The object dose not have to inherit from the interface as the library will handle the job of doing it

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.GetObjectType(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This will try and load the assembly and cached then from that assembly it will load typePath and also cach it, so it will load much faster next time

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.CreateProxyInstance(System.Type)
member.summary: Create a type that implement PropertyChanged. Note it will only include properties that are virtual If type containe PropertyChanged(object sender, PropertyChangedEventArgs e) it will be bound automatically otherwise you will have to add it manually

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.GetFastDeepClonerFields(System.Type)
member.summary: will return fieldInfo from the cached fieldinfo. Get and set value is much faster.

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.GetFastDeepClonerProperties(System.Type)
member.summary: will return propertyInfo from the cached propertyInfo. Get and set value is much faster.

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.CloneTo(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: This will handle only internal types and noneinternal type must be of the same type to be cloned

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.ValueConverter``1(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Convert Value from Type to Type when fail a default value will be loaded. can handle all known types like datetime, time span, string, long etc ex "1115rd" to int? will return null "152" to int? 152

member.name: M:FastDeepCloner.DeepCloner.ValueConverter(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Convert Value from Type to Type when fail a default value will be loaded. can handle all known types like datetime, time span, string, long etc ex "1115rd" to int? will return null "152" to int? 152
